summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Food System Early Warning & Shock Simulator with new UI/UX enhancements. All features working correctly including: Landing Page with glassmorphism, Jarvis AI Assistant, Network Graph visualization, Dashboard, Simulation, Risk Monitor, and Mandi Detail pages.

issues: Network graph SVG nodes are rendered but may not be visible in some viewport sizes - the container shows but nodes appear faint. This is a minor visual issue.

backend: GET /api/ - returns version and engines info
GET /api/stress - returns computed stress scores with breakdown (27/27 tests passed)
GET /api/mandi/{id} - returns stress breakdown including priceStress, supplyStress, instabilityStress, externalStress
POST /api/simulate - rain shock returns correct elasticity-based price impact (elasticity=0.4)
POST /api/simulate - demand_spike shock calculates demand increase correctly
POST /api/simulate - ripple effects work correctly (60% level 1, 30% level 2)
POST /api/recommend - returns rule-based recommendations with sourceMandi and destinationMandi
POST /api/recommend - with includeAiInsights=true returns AI-generated explanation
POST /api/jarvis/chat - Jarvis AI Assistant responds to queries
POST /api/jarvis/chat - Jarvis handles system context and conversation history
Stress calculation rules verified: price_change>8=+35, >4=+20; arrival_change<-10=+30, <-5=+15; rain/festival=+10 each
frontend: Landing Page loads with glassmorphism header and gradient grid background
Hero section displays headline 'Prevent Food Market Failures Before They Happen'
CTA buttons (Run Shock Propagation Engine, Explore Decision Platform) work correctly
Feature cards (Market Stress Index, Shock Propagation Engine, Stabilization Strategy) displayed
Navigation from landing to dashboard works
Dashboard displays System Stability Overview with metrics
Market Network section with legend (HIGH RISK, WATCH, NORMAL) displayed
6 mandi cards displayed with stress gauges showing scores (65, 80, 20, 20, 90, 55)
Jarvis AI FAB button opens assistant panel
Jarvis AI responds to queries with intelligent analysis
Shock Propagation Engine page loads with mandi dropdown, shock type cards, intensity/duration sliders
Simulation runs successfully showing price trajectory projection and network propagation
Simulation results show Economic Model Parameters (Elasticity: 0.4, Supply/Demand before/after)
Network Propagation shows affected mandis with Level 1: 60% and Level 2: 30% impact
Risk Monitor page shows Critical Risk (2) and Elevated Watch (2) sections
Mandi Detail page shows Price History and Arrivals History charts
Mandi Detail shows Stress Factor Breakdown (Price, Supply, Volatility, External)
Linked Markets section shows connected mandis with network effect explanation
Stabilization Strategy recommendations loading indicator displayed

context_for_next_testing_agent: All new UI/UX features tested and working: 1) Landing Page with glassmorphism header, gradient grid background, hero section with tilted dashboard preview, 2) Jarvis AI Decision Intelligence Assistant - opens via FAB button, responds to queries with context-aware analysis, 3) Network Graph visualization showing mandis as nodes with stress-based coloring, 4) Premium styling with rounded corners and soft shadows throughout. Backend APIs unchanged and all 27 tests passing including new Jarvis /api/jarvis/chat endpoint.

components: Glassmorphism header with logo and nav links
Hero section with headline and subtext
CTA buttons (Run Shock Propagation Engine, Explore Decision Platform)
Stats section (6 Markets Tracked, 0.4 Price Elasticity, 60% Ripple Factor)
Feature cards (Market Stress Index, Shock Propagation Engine, Stabilization Strategy)

features: Color-coded by stress level (red=high risk, orange=watch, green=normal)

components: System Stability Overview (System Stability %, Volatility Dampening, Supply Stress, Avg Market Stress)
Summary Stats (Total Mandis, High Risk, Under Watch, Stable)
Market Stress Index grid with 6 mandi cards

features: Shock type cards (Heavy Rainfall, Demand Spike, Supply Shortage, Transport Strike)
Results showing price trajectory and network propagation
System Risk Monitor header with active warnings count
Critical Risk section with high-risk mandis
Elevated Watch section with watch mandis
Clickable cards to navigate to mandi detail
Mandi header with name, location, commodity
Critical Alert message for high-risk mandis
Stress Factor Breakdown (Price, Supply, Volatility, External)
